thread.section_title: Wellington Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect for my stay!
thread.title_full: Perfect for my stay! - Review of Wellington Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: bethinbbTA
title: Perfect for my stay!
text:
I went to NYC for a few days on my own. Was looking for great location, good reviews, and priced inexpensive. Found it here at the Wellington.
First of all, my greeting was the warmest of all, a gentleman showed me to my room. It was not the single that I thought, but a double room with two baths
Although the decor is dated, I found it charming and warm. Vintage maybe.
The guest services were always spot on. They held my bag for me. I find it charming and inviting!! Would recommend to any loved one!
